column2: Difficulty with self-motivation and achieving goals. A lack of self-confidence can make setting personal goals challenging. A general lack of enthusiasm and a tendency to feel overwhelmed by change.

Highly motivated with many goals and aspirations for the future. Vital and spontaneous, enjoying the challenge of new and adventurous paths. Irrepressible enthusiasm. Weaknesses include a tendency to exaggerate and an inability to cope with mundane activities.
Difficulty coping with the realities of everyday life. Practical daily chores seem challenging, with difficulty concentrating on matters at hand.

Practical, efficient, and hands-on. A reliable, common-sense approach to most matters. A down-to-earth manner suited for daily chores. A weakness lies in a sometimes stubborn refusal to make changes and a tendency to stifle both personal and others' enthusiasm.
A lack of objectivityâ€”an inability to view life from a detached, rational perspective. Difficulty making decisions and weighing the pros and cons in a logical manner.

Objective and philosophical, preferring an intellectual perspective on life. The rational mind outweighs feelings, as the world of emotions is considered irrational. A high sense of fairness and a logical thought process. A weakness lies in viewing emotions in a disparaging light.

A disconnection from emotions, with public displays of strong emotion causing deep discomfort. A potential lack of compassion in relationships and difficulty honoring personal feelings and those of others.

Compassionate and caring with a strong intuitive nature, often speaking from the heart. Personal relationships are highly valued, frequently involving a caretaker role. Deeply sympathetic and understanding, which can lead to a nurturing role toward loved ones. Weaknesses include a lack of objectivity when necessary and a tendency to react without thinking things through.
